place

Class Forest

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • place.Place
        • place.Forest

  • public class Forest
extends Place
    Models a forest in the world. People and plants can be located in forest.
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow
    See Also:
    Plant

      String type,
      String climate)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Official name of forest.
        type - Type of forest (e.g. Evergreen Needleleaf, Deciduous broadleaf, Lowland evergreen broadleaf rain forest).
        climate - Climate of the forest (e.g tropical, warm, cold).
